card.name: Charcoal Inpachi
card.description: A wicked wooden spirit that has burned out. The barbecue grilled with this charcoal is so awesome that everybody thinks it's priceless.

card.name: Neo Aqua Madoor
card.description: The true nature of this wizard, who rules all water. It defends itself with a vast, impenetrable wall of ice.

card.name: Skull Dog Marron
card.description: A lost dog that wandered off 1000 years ago. He's still waiting for his master to come for him.

card.name: Goblin Calligrapher
card.description: A Goblin who devotes himself to mastering perfect calligraphy of the word "False". He gives his all to each stroke.

card.name: Ultimate Insect LV1
card.description: While this card is on the field, it is unaffected by the effects of Spell Cards. During your Standby Phase, by sending this face-up card to the Graveyard, Special Summon 1 "Ultimate Insect LV3" from your hand or Deck. (You cannot activate this effect the turn this card is Normal Summoned, Special Summoned, or flipped face-up.)

card.name: Horus the Black Flame Dragon LV4
card.description: Control of this face-up card cannot switch. During the End Phase, if this card destroyed a monster by battle this turn: You can send this face-up card to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 "Horus the Black Flame Dragon LV6" from your hand or Deck.

card.name: Horus the Black Flame Dragon LV6
card.description: This card is unaffected by Spell effects. During the End Phase, if this card destroyed a monster by battle this turn: You can send this face-up card to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 "Horus the Black Flame Dragon LV8" from your hand or Deck.

card.name: Horus the Black Flame Dragon LV8
card.description: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by "Horus the Black Flame Dragon LV6", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. During either player's turn, when a Spell Card is activated: You can negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it. You must control this face-up card to activate and to resolve this effect.

card.name: Dark Mimic LV1
card.description: FLIP: Draw 1 card.During your Standby Phase: You can send this face-up card to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 "Dark Mimic LV3" from your hand or Deck.

card.name: Dark Mimic LV3
card.description: If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: Draw 1 card, but if this card was Special Summoned by the effect of "Dark Mimic LV1", draw 2 cards instead.

card.name: Mystic Swordsman LV2
card.description: At the start of the Damage Step, if this card attacked a face-down Defense Position monster: Destroy that monster. During the End Phase, if this card destroyed a monster by battle this turn: You can send this face-up card to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 "Mystic Swordsman LV4" from your hand or Deck.

card.name: Mystic Swordsman LV4
card.description: Cannot be Normal Summoned (but can be Normal Set). At the start of the Damage Step, if this card attacked a face-down Defense Position monster: Destroy that monster. During the End Phase, if this card destroyed a monster by battle this turn: You can send this face-up card to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 "Mystic Swordsman LV6" from your hand or Deck.

card.name: Armed Dragon LV3
card.description: During your Standby Phase: You can send this card to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Armed Dragon LV5" from your hand or Deck.

card.name: Armed Dragon LV5
card.description: You can send 1 monster from your hand to the GY, then target 1 monster your opponent controls with ATK less than or equal to the sent monster's ATK; destroy that target. During the End Phase, if this card destroyed a monster by battle this turn: You can send this card to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Armed Dragon LV7" from your hand or Deck.

card.name: Armed Dragon LV7
card.description: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by "Armed Dragon LV5". You can send 1 monster from your hand to the GY; destroy all monsters your opponent controls with ATK less than or equal to that sent monster's ATK.

card.name: Horus' Servant
card.description: Your opponent cannot target face-up "Horus the Black Flame Dragon" monsters with Spells, Traps, or card effects.

card.name: Black Dragon's Chick (Updated from: Red-Eyes B. Chick)
card.description: You can send this face-up card you control to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 "Red-Eyes B. Dragon" from your hand.NoteCard Name updated from "Red-Eyes B. Chick" on November 18, 2016.

card.name: Malice Doll of Demise
card.description: During your next Standby Phase after this card was sent from the field to the Graveyard by the effect of a Continuous Spell Card: Special Summon this card from the Graveyard.

card.name: Ninja Grandmaster Sasuke
card.description: At the start of the Damage Step, if this card attacks a face-up Defense Position monster: Destroy that monster.

card.name: Rafflesia Seduction
card.description: FLIP: Take control of 1 face-up monster on your opponent's side of the field until the end of this turn.

card.name: Ultimate Baseball Kid
card.description: This card gains 1000 ATK for each face-up FIRE monster on the field, except this card. You can send 1 other face-up FIRE monster you control to the Graveyard; inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

card.name: Mobius the Frost Monarch
card.description: When this card is Tribute Summoned: You can target up to 2 Spell/Trap Cards on the field; destroy those targets.

card.name: Element Dragon
card.description: This monster gets the following effect(s) while there is a monster(s) with the following Attribute(s) on the field:●FIRE: This card gains 500 ATK.●WIND: If this card destroyed your opponent's monster by battle, it can attack once again in a row.

card.name: Element Soldier
card.description: This monster gets the following effect(s) while there is a monster(s) with the following Attribute(s) on the field:●WATER: Control of this card cannot switch.●EARTH: Negate the effect of an Effect Monster that this card destroyed by battle.

card.name: Howling Insect
card.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 Insect-Type monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck.

card.name: Masked Dragon
card.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 Dragon-Type monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck.

card.name: Mind on Air
card.description: Your opponent must play with their hand revealed.

card.name: Unshaven Angler
card.description: When Tribute Summoning a WATER monster, you can treat this 1 monster as 2 Tributes.

card.name: The Trojan Horse
card.description: When Tribute Summoning an EARTH monster, you can treat this 1 monster as 2 Tributes.

card.name: Nobleman-Eater Bug
card.description: FLIP: Destroy 2 monsters on the field.

card.name: Enraged Muka Muka
card.description: This card gains 400 ATK and DEF for each card in your hand.

card.name: Hade-Hane
card.description: FLIP: You can return up to 3 monsters on the field to the owner's hand.

card.name: Penumbral Soldier Lady
card.description: If this card battles a LIGHT monster, this card gains 1000 ATK during the Damage Step only.

card.name: Ojama King
card.description: "Ojama Green" + "Ojama Yellow" + "Ojama Black"Select up to 3 of your opponent's Monster Card Zones. The selected zones cannot be used.

card.name: Master of Oz
card.description: "Big Koala" + "Des Kangaroo"

card.name: Sanwitch
card.description: "Sangan" + "Witch of the Black Forest"

card.name: Dark Factory of Mass Production
card.description: Target 2 Normal Monsters in your GY; add them to your hand.

card.name: Hammer Shot
card.description: Destroy the 1 face-up Attack Position monster that has the highest ATK. (If it's a tie, you get to choose.)

card.name: Mind Wipe
card.description: Activate only if your opponent has 3 or less cards in their hand. Your opponent adds their hand to the Deck and shuffles it, then draws the same number of cards they added to the Deck.

card.name: Abyssal Designator
card.description: Pay 1000 Life Points. Declare a Type and an Attribute. Your opponent must send 1 monster with both the declared Type and Attribute from their hand or Deck to the Graveyard.

card.name: Level Up!
card.description: Send 1 face-up "LV" monster you control to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 monster from your hand or Deck that is listed in the sent monster's text, ignoring its Summoning conditions.

card.name: Inferno Fire Blast
card.description: Target 1 "Red-Eyes B. Dragon" in your Monster Zone; inflict damage to your opponent equal to its original ATK. "Red-Eyes B. Dragon" cannot attack the turn you activate this card.

card.name: Ectoplasmer
card.description: Once per turn, during each player's End Phase: The turn player must Tribute 1 face-up monster, and if they do, inflict damage to their opponent equal to half the original ATK of the Tributed monster.

card.name: The Graveyard in the Fourth Dimension
card.description: Add 2 "LV" monsters from your Graveyard to your Deck and shuffle it.

card.name: Two-Man Cell Battle
card.description: During each player's End Phase, the turn player can Special Summon 1 Level 4 Normal Monster from their hand.

card.name: Big Wave Small Wave
card.description: Destroy all face-up WATER monsters you control, then you can Special Summon WATER monsters from your hand, up to the number of monsters destroyed by this effect.

card.name: Fusion Weapon
card.description: Equip only to a Level 6 or lower Fusion Monster. The equipped monster gains 1500 ATK and DEF.

card.name: Ritual Weapon
card.description: Equip only to a Level 6 or lower Ritual Monster. It gains 1500 ATK and DEF.

card.name: Taunt
card.description: Activate only during your opponent's Main Phase 1; select 1 monster on your side of the field. While the selected card remains on the field, if your opponent attacks with a monster(s) this turn, they must select the selected monster as the attack target.

card.name: Absolute End
card.description: Activate only during your opponent's turn. This turn, the attacks from your opponent's monsters become direct attacks.

card.name: Spirit Barrier
card.description: While you control a monster, you take no battle damage.

card.name: Ninjitsu Art of Decoy
card.description: Target 1 face-up "Ninja" monster you control; it cannot be destroyed by battle.

card.name: Enervating Mist
card.description: Your opponent's hand size limit becomes 5.

card.name: Heavy Slump
card.description: If your opponent has 8 or more cards in their hand: They shuffle their entire hand into the Deck, then draw 2 cards.

card.name: Greed
card.description: Each time a player draws cards because of a card effect, they take 500 damage during the End Phase for each card drawn by the card effect.

card.name: Mind Crush
card.description: Declare 1 card name; if that card is in your opponent's hand, they must discard all copies of it, otherwise you discard 1 random card.

card.name: Muko (Updated from: Null and Void)
card.description: Activate only when an effect of drawing card(s) is activated. Both players see the cards drawn by the effect and discard them all to the Graveyard.NoteCard Name updated from "Null and Void". (Printed version not yet available.)

card.name: Gorgon's Eye
card.description: Until the end of this turn, all effects of Defense Position monsters are negated.

card.name: Cemetary Bomb
card.description: Inflict 100 damage to your opponent for each card in their Graveyard.

card.name: Hallowed Life Barrier
card.description: Discard 1 card from your hand. This turn, any damage you take from your opponent's cards and effects becomes 0.

card.name: Woodborg Inpachi
card.description: The new form of the enigmatic Inpachi, remodeled by cutting-edge Dark World technology. Maneuverability has been sacrificed for strong armor, which is considered more important.

card.name: Mighty Guard
card.description: A machine soldier that was developed as a guard. It is made of rust-proof metal.

card.name: Bokoichi the Freightening Car
card.description: A freight car that is exclusively for Dekoichi. It can transport anything, but most cargo arrives broken.

card.name: Harpie Girl
card.description: A Harpie chick who aspires to flit about beautifully and gorgeously, but attack sharply.

card.name: The Creator
card.description: Cannot be Special Summoned from the Graveyard. Once per turn: You can target 1 monster in your Graveyard; send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard, and if you do, Special Summon that target.

card.name: The Creator Incarnate
card.description: You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "The Creator" from your hand.

card.name: Ultimate Insect LV3
card.description: If this card was Special Summoned by the effect of "Ultimate Insect LV1", while it remains on the field all of your opponent's monsters lose 300 ATK. During your Standby Phase, by sending this face-up card to the Graveyard, Special Summon 1 "Ultimate Insect LV5" from your hand or Deck. (You cannot activate this effect the turn this card is Normal Summoned, Special Summoned, or flipped face-up.)

card.name: Mystic Swordsman LV6
card.description: Cannot be Normal Summoned (but can be Normal Set). At the start of the Damage Step, if this card attacked a face-down Defense Position monster: Destroy that monster, and if you do, you can place it on top of your opponent's Deck instead of sending it to the Graveyard.

card.name: Silent Swordsman LV3
card.description: Negate your opponent's Spell effects that target this card. During your Standby Phase: You can send this face-up card to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 "Silent Swordsman LV5" from your hand or Deck. You cannot activate this effect the turn this card is Summoned or flipped face-up.

card.name: Nightmare Penguin
card.description: All face-up WATER monsters you control gain 200 ATK. When this card is flipped face-up: Target 1 card your opponent controls; return that target to the hand.

card.name: Heavy Mech Support Platform
card.description: Once per turn, you can either: Target 1 Machine monster you control; equip this card to that target, OR: Unequip this card and Special Summon it. A monster equipped with this card gains 500 ATK/DEF, also if the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle or card effect, destroy this card instead.

card.name: Perfect Machine King
card.description: This card gains 500 ATK for each other Machine-Type monster on the field.

card.name: Element Magician
card.description: This monster gets the following effect(s) while there is a monster(s) with the following Attribute(s) on the field:●WATER: Control of this card cannot switch.●WIND: If this card destroyed your opponent's monster by battle, it can attack once again in a row.

card.name: Element Saurus
card.description: Gains the following effect(s) while there is a monster(s) with the following Attribute(s) on the field.●FIRE: This card gains 500 ATK.●EARTH: Negate the effects of Effect Monsters destroyed by battle with this card.

card.name: Roc from the Valley of Haze
card.description: When this card is sent directly from your hand to the Graveyard, add this card to the Deck and shuffle it.

card.name: Sasuke Samurai #4
card.description: If this card battles a monster, toss a coin and call heads or tails before damage calculation. If you call it right, destroy the opponent's monster with this effect.

card.name: Harpie Lady 1
card.description: (This card's name is always treated as "Harpie Lady".)All WIND monsters gain 300 ATK.

card.name: Harpie Lady 2
card.description: (This card's name is always treated as "Harpie Lady".)Negate the effects of Flip monsters this card destroys by battle.

card.name: Harpie Lady 3
card.description: (This card's name is always treated as "Harpie Lady".)An opponent's monster that battles this card cannot declare an attack during your opponent's next 2 turns.

card.name: Raging Flame Sprite
card.description: This card can attack your opponent directly. If this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent by a direct attack: This card gains 1000 ATK.

card.name: Thestalos the Firestorm Monarch
card.description: If this card is Tribute Summoned: Discard 1 random card from your opponent's hand, then, if it was a Monster Card, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its original Level x 100.

card.name: Eagle Eye
card.description: When this card is Normal Summoned successfully, no Trap Cards can be activated.

card.name: Tactical Espionage Expert
card.description: When this card is Normal Summoned successfully, no Trap Cards can be activated.

card.name: Invasion of Flames
card.description: When this card is Normal Summoned successfully, no Trap Cards can be activated.

card.name: Creeping Doom Manta
card.description: When this card is Normal Summoned successfully, no Trap Cards can be activated.

card.name: Pitch-Black Warwolf
card.description: Your opponent cannot activate Trap Cards during the Battle Phase.

card.name: Mirage Dragon
card.description: Your opponent cannot activate Trap Cards during the Battle Phase.

card.name: Gaia Soul the Combustible Collective
card.description: Once per turn: You can Tribute up to 2 Pyro-Type monsters; this card gains 1000 ATK for each. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent. During the End Phase: Destroy this card.

card.name: Fox Fire
card.description: During the End Phase, if this card was destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard this turn and was face-up at the start of the Damage Step: Special Summon this card from the Graveyard. This face-up card cannot be Tributed for a Tribute Summon.

card.name: B.E.S. Big Core (Updated from: Big Core)
card.description: If this card is Normal Summoned: Place 3 counters on it. Cannot be destroyed by battle. At the end of the Damage Step, if this card battled: Remove 1 counter from this card. If you cannot, destroy it.NoteCard Name updated from "Big Core" on April 07, 2017.

card.name: Fusilier Dragon, the Dual-Mode Beast
card.description: You can Normal Summon/Set this card without Tributing, but its original ATK and DEF become halved.

card.name: Dekoichi the Battlechanted Locomotive
card.description: FLIP: Draw 1 card, then draw 1 additional card for each face-up "Bokoichi the Freightening Car" you control.

card.name: A-Team: Trap Disposal Unit
card.description: This effect can be used during either player's turn. When your opponent activates a Trap Card, Tribute this face-up card to negate the activation of the Trap Card and destroy it.

card.name: Homunculus the Alchemic Being
card.description: Once per turn: You can change the Attribute of this card.

card.name: Dark Blade the Dragon Knight
card.description: "Dark Blade" + "Pitch-Dark Dragon"Each time this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, you can select up to 3 Monster Cards from your opponent's Graveyard and remove them from play.

card.name: Mokey Mokey King
card.description: "Mokey Mokey" + "Mokey Mokey" + "Mokey Mokey"When this card is removed from the field, you can Special Summon as many "Mokey Mokey" as possible from your Graveyard.

card.name: Serial Spell
card.description: Activate only when you activate one of your Normal Spell Cards. Discard all the cards in your hand to the Graveyard. The effect of this card becomes the same as the Normal Spell Card.

card.name: Harpies' Hunting Ground
card.description: All Winged Beast monsters gain 200 ATK/DEF. If any "Harpie Lady" or "Harpie Lady Sisters" is Normal or Special Summoned: The player who conducted the Summon targets 1 Spell/Trap on the field; that player destroys that target.

card.name: Triangle Ecstasy Spark
card.description: Until the end of this turn, the ATK of all "Harpie Lady Sisters" currently on the field becomes 2700, your opponent cannot activate any Trap Cards, also negate all your opponent's Trap effects on the field.

card.name: Necklace of Command
card.description: When a monster you control that's equipped with this card is destroyed by battle, and this card is sent to the Graveyard, you can either:●Draw 1 card. OR●Discard 1 random card from your opponent's hand.

card.name: Machine Duplication
card.description: Target 1 Machine monster you control with 500 or less ATK; Special Summon up to 2 monsters from your Deck with the same name as that face-up monster.

card.name: Flint
card.description: A monster equipped with this card loses 300 ATK and cannot change its Battle Position or attack. If the equipped monster is destroyed, select 1 monster on the field and equip this card to that monster.

card.name: Mokey Mokey Smackdown
card.description: While a face-up "Mokey Mokey" is on your side of the field, if a Fairy-Type monster on your side of the field is destroyed, the ATK of each "Mokey Mokey" on your side of the field becomes 3000 until the end of this turn.

card.name: Back to Square One
card.description: Discard 1 card, then target 1 monster on the field; place that target on the top of the Deck.

card.name: Monster Reincarnation
card.description: Discard 1 card, then target 1 monster in your GY; add it to your hand.

card.name: Ballista of Rampart Smashing
card.description: If the equipped monster attacks a face-down Defense Position monster, it gains 1500 ATK during damage calculation only.

card.name: Lighten the Load
card.description: Once per turn, you can add 1 Level 7 or higher monster from your hand to your Deck and shuffle it, then draw 1 card.

card.name: Malice Dispersion
card.description: Discard 1 card from your hand. Destroy all face-up Continuous Trap Cards.

card.name: Tragedy
card.description: When a face-up Attack Position monster(s) your opponent controls is changed to face-up Defense Position: Destroy all Defense Position monsters your opponent controls.

card.name: Divine Wrath
card.description: When a monster effect is activated: Discard 1 card; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that monster.

card.name: Xing Zhen Hu
card.description: Activate by selecting 2 Set Spell or Trap Cards on the field. The selected Spell or Trap Cards cannot be activated.

card.name: Rare Metalmorph
card.description: Activate this card by targeting 1 Machine-Type monster on the field; it gains 500 ATK. Once, negate a Spell effect that targets that monster. When that monster leaves the field, destroy this card.

card.name: Fruits of Kozaky's Studies
card.description: Look at the top 3 cards of your Deck and return those cards to the top of the Deck in any order.

card.name: Mind Haxorz
card.description: Pay 500 Life Points. Look at your opponent's hand and all Set cards on their side of the field.

card.name: Fuh-Rin-Ka-Zan
card.description: When there are face-up WIND, WATER, FIRE and EARTH monster(s) on the field: Apply 1 of these effects.●Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.●Destroy all Spell and Trap Cards your opponent controls.●Discard 2 random cards from your opponent's hand.●Draw 2 cards.

card.name: Chain Burst
card.description: Each time a player activates a Trap Card, they take 1000 damage immediately after it resolves.

card.name: Pikeru's Circle of Enchantment
card.description: Damage to you from card effects becomes 0 until the end of this turn.

card.name: Spell Purification
card.description: Discard 1 card from your hand. Destroy all face-up Continuous Spell Cards.

card.name: Astral Barrier
card.description: If your opponent's monster attacks a monster you control: You can make the attack a direct attack instead.

card.name: Covering Fire
card.description: During the Damage Step, while an opponent's monster is attacking a monster you control: Target 1 other face-up monster you control; your attacked monster gains ATK equal to that target's ATK during the Damage Step only.

card.name: Space Mambo
card.description: A Space Mambo floating in the vast universe. This living relic was found in the ruins of a super civilization on Alphard 4.

card.name: Divine Dragon Ragnarok
card.description: A legendary dragon sent by the gods as their instrument. Legends say that if provoked, the whole world will sink beneath the sea.

card.name: Chu-Ske the Mouse Fighter
card.description: A fiery mouse, travelling the world to become the strongest fighter in the world of mice. Be careful not to touch him, or you will get burned.

card.name: Insect Knight
card.description: Of all Insect fighters, he is the paragon of the Indestructible Insect Invaders, which only the elite of the elite can join. We can no longer ignore their unmatched battle prowess.

card.name: Sacred Phoenix of Nephthys
card.description: Once per turn, during your next Standby Phase after this card was destroyed by a card effect and sent to the GY: Special Summon this card from the GY. If you do: Destroy all Spells and Traps on the field.

card.name: Hand of Nephthys
card.description: You can Tribute this card and 1 other monster; Special Summon 1 "Sacred Phoenix of Nephthys" from your hand or Deck.

card.name: Ultimate Insect LV5
card.description: If this card was Special Summoned by the effect of "Ultimate Insect LV3", while it remains on the field all of your opponent's monsters lose 500 ATK. During your Standby Phase, by sending this face-up card to the Graveyard, Special Summon 1 "Ultimate Insect LV7" from your hand or Deck. (You cannot activate this effect the turn this card is Normal Summoned, Special Summoned, or flipped face-up.)

card.name: Silent Swordsman LV5
card.description: Unaffected by your opponent's Spell effects. During your next Standby Phase after this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent by a direct attack: You can send this face-up card to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 "Silent Swordsman LV7" from your hand or Deck.

card.name: Granmarg the Rock Monarch
card.description: If this card is Tribute Summoned: Target 1 Set card on the field; destroy that target.

card.name: Element Valkyrie
card.description: (This card is not treated as a "Valkyrie" card.)This monster gets the following effect(s) while there is a monster(s) with the following Attribute(s) on the field:●FIRE: This card gains 500 ATK.●WATER: Control of this card cannot switch.

card.name: Element Doom
card.description: This monster gets the following effect(s) while there is a monster(s) with the following Attribute(s) on the field:●EARTH: Negate the effect of an Effect Monster that this card destroyed by battle.●WIND: If this card destroyed your opponent's monster by battle, it can attack once again in a row.

card.name: Maji-Gire Panda
card.description: Each time a Beast-Type monster(s) on the field is destroyed, this card gains 500 ATK.

card.name: Catnipped Kitty
card.description: This card cannot be attacked if there is another Beast-Type monster on your side of the field. Once per turn, you can make the DEF of 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field 0 until the end of this turn.

card.name: Behemoth the King of All Animals
card.description: This card can be Normal Summoned or Set with 1 Tribute. In that case, the original ATK of this card becomes 2000. When this card is Tribute Summoned, you can return from your Graveyard to the owner's hand a number of Beast-Type monsters equal to the number of Tributed monsters.

card.name: Big-Tusked Mammoth
card.description: Monsters your opponent controls cannot attack the turn they are Summoned.

card.name: Kangaroo Champ
card.description: A monster that battles with this card is changed to Defense Position after damage calculation.

card.name: Hyena
card.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon any number of "Hyenas" from your Deck.

card.name: Blade Rabbit
card.description: When this card is changed from Attack Position to face-up Defense Position, destroy 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field.

card.name: Mecha-Dog Marron
card.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, inflict 1000 damage to both players. When this card on the field is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard except by battle, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

card.name: Blast Magician
card.description: Each time a Spell Card is activated, place 1 Spell Counter on this card when that Spell Card resolves. You can remove any number of Spell Counters from this card, then target 1 face-up monster on the field with ATK less than or equal to the number of counters you removed x 700; destroy that target.

card.name: Chiron the Mage
card.description: Once per turn: You can discard 1 Spell Card, then target 1 Spell/Trap Card your opponent controls; destroy that target.

card.name: Gearfried the Swordmaster
card.description: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned with "Release Restraint". Each time an Equip Card(s) is equipped to this card: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy that target.

card.name: Armed Samurai - Ben Kei
card.description: For each Equip Card equipped to this card, it gains 1 additional attack during each Battle Phase.

card.name: Shadowslayer
card.description: If all monsters your opponent controls are in Defense Position, this card can attack your opponent directly.

card.name: Golem Sentry
card.description: Once per turn: You can change this card to face-down Defense Position. When this card is Flip Summoned: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; return that target to the hand.

card.name: Abare Ushioni
card.description: Once per turn, you can toss a coin and call it. If you call it right, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. If you call it wrong, you take 1000 damage.

card.name: The Light - Hex-Sealed Fusion
card.description: You can substitute this card for any 1 Fusion Material Monster, but the other Fusion Material Monster(s) must be correct. You can Tribute Fusion Material Monsters on the field, including this face-up card; Special Summon 1 corresponding LIGHT Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck.

card.name: The Dark - Hex-Sealed Fusion
card.description: You can substitute this card for any 1 Fusion Material Monster, but the other Fusion Material Monster(s) must be correct. You can Tribute Fusion Material Monsters on the field, including this face-up card; Special Summon 1 corresponding DARK Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck.

card.name: The Earth - Hex-Sealed Fusion
card.description: You can substitute this card for any 1 Fusion Material Monster, but the other Fusion Material Monster(s) must be correct. You can Tribute Fusion Material Monsters on the field, including this face-up card; Special Summon 1 corresponding EARTH Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck.

card.name: Whirlwind Prodigy
card.description: When Tribute Summoning a WIND monster, you can treat this 1 monster as 2 Tributes.

card.name: Flame Ruler
card.description: This card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a FIRE monster.

card.name: Firebird
card.description: Each time a Winged Beast-Type monster(s) on your side of the field is destroyed, this card gains 500 ATK.

card.name: Rescue Cat
card.description: You can send this card to the Graveyard; Special Summon 2 Level 3 or lower Beast-Type monsters from your Deck, but they have their effects negated, also they are destroyed during the End Phase. You can only use this effect of "Rescue Cat" once per turn.

card.name: Brain Jacker
card.description: FLIP: Equip this card to a monster on your opponent's side of the field and treat it as an Equip Card. Take control of the equipped monster. Your opponent gains 500 Life Points during each of their Standby Phases.

card.name: Gatling Dragon
card.description: "Barrel Dragon" + "Blowback Dragon"Once per turn: You can toss a coin 3 times and destroy as many monsters on the field as possible, but not more than the number of heads.

card.name: King Dragun
card.description: "Lord of D." + "Divine Dragon Ragnarok"Your opponent cannot select any Dragon-Type monsters as the target(s) of Spell, Trap, or Monster Card effects. Once per turn, you can Special Summon 1 Dragon-Type monster from your hand.

card.name: A Feather of the Phoenix
card.description: Discard 1 card, then target 1 card in your GY; return that target to the top of your Deck.

card.name: Poison Fangs
card.description: Each time a Beast-Type monster inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

card.name: Spell Absorption
card.description: Each time a Spell Card is activated, gain 500 LP immediately after it resolves.

card.name: Lightning Vortex
card.description: Discard 1 card; destroy all face-up monsters your opponent controls.

card.name: Meteor of Destruction
card.description: If your opponent's Life Points are higher than 3000: Inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

card.name: Swords of Concealing Light
card.description: Destroy this card during your 2nd Standby Phase after activation. When this card resolves, change all monsters your opponent controls to face-down Defense Position. Monsters your opponent controls cannot change their battle positions.

card.name: Spiral Spear Strike
card.description: If "Gaia The Fierce Knight", "Swift Gaia the Fierce Knight", or "Gaia the Dragon Champion" you control attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent. If "Gaia the Dragon Champion" inflicts battle damage with this effect: Draw 2 cards, then discard 1 card.

card.name: Release Restraint
card.description: Tribute 1 "Gearfried the Iron Knight"; Special Summon 1 "Gearfried the Swordmaster" from your hand or Deck.

card.name: Centrifugal Field
card.description: When a Fusion Monster(s) is destroyed by a card effect and sent to the Graveyard: Its owner targets 1 Fusion Material Monster in their Graveyard that is listed on that Fusion Monster; that player Special Summons that target.

card.name: Fulfillment of the Contract
card.description: Activate this card by paying 800 LP, then target 1 Ritual Monster in your GY; Special Summon it and equip it with this card. When this card is destroyed, banish the equipped monster.

card.name: Re-Fusion
card.description: Activate this card by paying 800 LP, then target 1 Fusion Monster in your GY; Special Summon it and equip it with this card. When this card is destroyed, banish the equipped monster.

card.name: The Big March of Animals
card.description: Until the end of this turn, all face-up Beast-Type monsters on your side of the field gain 200 ATK for each Beast-Type monster on your side of the field.

card.name: Cross Counter
card.description: If the DEF of an attacked Defense Position monster is higher than the ATK of your opponent's attacking monster, the Battle Damage inflicted to your opponent is doubled. Destroy the attacking monster after damage calculation.

card.name: Pole Position
card.description: The face-up monster(s) with the highest ATK on the field is unaffected by the effects of Spell Cards. When "Pole Position" is removed from the field, destroy the face-up monster(s) with the highest ATK on the field.

card.name: Penalty Game!
card.description: When your opponent has 4 cards in their hand: Activate 1 of these effects.●Your opponent cannot draw during their next Draw Phase.●Your opponent cannot activate Spell/Trap Cards this turn.

card.name: Threatening Roar
card.description: Your opponent cannot declare an attack this turn.

card.name: Phoenix Wing Wind Blast
card.description: Discard 1 card, then target 1 card your opponent controls; place that target on the top of the Deck.

card.name: Good Goblin Housekeeping
card.description: Draw cards equal to the number of "Good Goblin Housekeeping" cards in your Graveyard +1, then select 1 card from your hand and return it to the bottom of your Deck.

card.name: Beast Soul Swap
card.description: Target 1 Beast-Type monster you control; return it to the hand, and if you do, Special Summon 1 Beast-Type monster from your hand with the same Level as the monster that was returned to the hand.

card.name: Assault on GHQ
card.description: Select 1 monster on your side of the field to activate this card. Destroy the selected card and send 2 cards from the top of your opponent's Deck to the Graveyard.

card.name: D.D. Dynamite
card.description: Inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each of their removed from play cards.

card.name: Deck Devastation Virus
card.description: Tribute 1 DARK monster with 2000 or more ATK; look at your opponent's hand, all monsters they control, and all cards they draw until the end of their 3rd turn after this card's activation, and destroy all those monsters with 1500 or less ATK.

card.name: Elemental Burst
card.description: Tribute 1 each of WIND, WATER, FIRE, and EARTH monsters to activate this card. Destroy all cards on your opponent's side of the field.

card.name: Forced Ceasefire
card.description: Discard 1 card from your hand. No Trap Cards can be activated until the end of this turn.

card.name: Elemental HERO Avian
card.description: A winged Elemental HERO who wheels through the sky and manipulates the wind. His signature move, Featherbreak, gives villainy a blow from sky-high.

card.name: Elemental HERO Burstinatrix
card.description: A flame manipulator who was the first Elemental HERO woman. Her Burstfire burns away villainy.

card.name: Elemental HERO Clayman
card.description: An Elemental HERO with a clay body built-to-last. He'll preserve his Elemental HERO colleagues at any cost.

card.name: Elemental HERO Sparkman
card.description: An Elemental HERO and a warrior of light who proficiently wields many kinds of armaments. His Static Shockwave cuts off the path of villainy.

card.name: Winged Kuriboh
card.description: If this card on the field is destroyed and sent to the GY: For the rest of this turn, you take no battle damage.

card.name: Ancient Gear Golem
card.description: Cannot be Special Summoned. If this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate any Spell/Trap Cards until the end of the Damage Step. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage.

card.name: Ancient Gear Beast
card.description: Cannot be Special Summoned. If this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate any Spell/Trap Cards until the end of the Damage Step. Negate the effects of an opponent's monster destroyed by battle with this card (including in the Graveyard).

card.name: Ancient Gear Soldier
card.description: If this card attacks, your opponent cannot activate any Spell/Trap Cards until the end of the Damage Step.

card.name: Millennium Scorpion
card.description: Each time this card destroys 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, this card gains 500 ATK.

card.name: Ultimate Insect LV7
card.description: If this card was Special Summoned by the effect of "Ultimate Insect LV5", while it remains on the field all of your opponent's monsters lose 700 ATK and DEF.

card.name: Lost Guardian
card.description: The original DEF of this card equals the number of your banished Rock-Type monsters x 700.

card.name: Hieracosphinx
card.description: Your opponent cannot select a face-down Defense Position monster as an attack target.

card.name: Criosphinx
card.description: When a monster is returned from the field to the owner's hand, the owner of the returned monster selects and sends 1 card in their hand to the Graveyard.

card.name: Moai Interceptor Cannons
card.description: Once per turn, you can flip this card into face-down Defense Position.

card.name: Megarock Dragon
card.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by removing from play a Rock-Type monster(s) in your Graveyard. The original ATK and DEF of this card become the number of Rock-Type monsters you removed from play when you Special Summoned this card x 700.

card.name: Dummy Golem
card.description: FLIP: Your opponent selects 1 monster they control. Switch control of the selected monster and this card.

card.name: Grave Ohja
card.description: While there is a face-down Defense Position monster(s) on your side of the field, no player can select this card as an attack target. Each time a monster on your side of the field is Flip Summoned, inflict 300 damage to your opponent.

card.name: Mine Golem
card.description: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

card.name: Monk Fighter
card.description: Battle Damage to this card's controller from a battle involving this card becomes 0.

card.name: Master Monk
card.description: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card cannot be Special Summoned except by Tributing 1 "Monk Fighter". This card can attack twice during the same turn.

card.name: Guardian Statue
card.description: Once per turn, you can flip this card into face-down Defense Position. When this card is Flip Summoned, return 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field to its owner's hand.

card.name: Medusa Worm
card.description: Once per turn, you can flip this card into face-down Defense Position. When this card is Flip Summoned, destroy 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field.

card.name: D.D. Survivor
card.description: During the End Phase, if this card was banished while face-up, on your side of the field, this turn: Special Summon this banished card. This effect can only activate once per turn.

card.name: Mid Shield Gardna
card.description: Once per turn, you can flip this card into face-down Defense Position. Negate the activation of any Spell Card that targets this 1 face-down monster. At that time, flip this card into face-up Defense Position.

card.name: White Ninja
card.description: FLIP: Target 1 Defense Position monster on the field; destroy that target.

card.name: Aussa the Earth Charmer
card.description: FLIP: While this card is face-up on the field, take control of 1 EARTH monster your opponent controls.

card.name: Eria the Water Charmer
card.description: FLIP: Target 1 face-up WATER monster your opponent controls; take control of that target while this card is face-up on the field.

card.name: Hiita the Fire Charmer
card.description: FLIP: Target 1 face-up FIRE monster your opponent controls; take control of that target while this card is face-up on the field.

card.name: Wynn the Wind Charmer
card.description: FLIP: While this card is face-up on the field, take control of 1 WIND monster your opponent controls.

card.name: Batteryman AA
card.description: If all "Batteryman AA"(s) on your side of the field are in Attack Position, this card gains 1000 ATK for each "Batteryman AA" on your side of the field. If all "Batteryman AA"(s) on your side of the field are in Defense Position, this card gains 1000 DEF for each "Batteryman AA" on your side of the field.

card.name: Des Wombat
card.description: Any damage to you from a card effect becomes 0.

card.name: King of the Skull Servants
card.description: The original ATK of this card is the combined number of "King of the Skull Servants" and "Skull Servant" in your GY x 1000. When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: You can banish 1 other "King of the Skull Servants" or 1 "Skull Servant" from your GY; Special Summon this card.

card.name: Reshef the Dark Being
card.description: This card can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Final Ritual of the Ancients". Once per turn, by discarding 1 Spell Card from your hand, take control of 1 monster on your opponent's side of the field until the end of this turn.

card.name: Elemental Mistress Doriado
card.description: This card can only be Ritual Summoned with the Ritual Spell Card, "Doriado's Blessing". The Attribute of this card is also treated as WIND, WATER, FIRE, and EARTH while it is face-up on the field.

card.name: Elemental HERO Flame Wingman
card.description: "Elemental HERO Avian" + "Elemental HERO Burstinatrix"Must be Fusion Summoned and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. When this card destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster in the Graveyard.

card.name: Elemental HERO Thunder Giant
card.description: "Elemental HERO Sparkman" + "Elemental HERO Clayman"Must be Fusion Summoned and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Once per turn: You can discard 1 card to target 1 face-up monster on the field with original ATK less than the ATK of this card; destroy that target.

card.name: Card of Sanctity
card.description: Banish all other cards you control and in your hand (min.1 from each); draw until you have 2 cards in your hand.

card.name: Brain Control
card.description: Pay 800 LP, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls that can be Normal Summoned/Set; take control of that target until the End Phase.

card.name: Gift of the Martyr
card.description: Send 1 monster on your side of the field to the Graveyard. Select 1 monster on your side of the field. The selected monster gains ATK equal to the ATK of the sent monster until the end of this turn.

card.name: Double Attack
card.description: Discard 1 Monster Card from your hand to the Graveyard. Select 1 monster on your side of the field with a lower Level than the discarded monster. The selected monster can attack twice this turn.

card.name: Battery Charger
card.description: Pay 500 Life Points. Special Summon 1 "Batteryman" monster from your Graveyard.

card.name: Kaminote Blow
card.description: Activate only if there is at least 1 face-up "Chu-Ske the Mouse Fighter", "Monk Fighter", or "Master Monk" on your side of the field. Destroy the monster(s) that battle with these monsters on your side of the field this turn, at the end of each Damage Step.

card.name: Doriado's Blessing
card.description: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Elemental Mistress Doriado". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 3 or more from the field or your hand.

card.name: Final Ritual of the Ancients
card.description: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Reshef the Dark Being". You must also Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 8 or more from the field or your hand.

card.name: Legendary Black Belt
card.description: Equip only to "Chu-Ske the Mouse Fighter", "Monk Fighter", or "Master Monk". When the equipped monster destroys your opponent's monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the DEF of the destroyed monster.

card.name: Nitro Unit
card.description: Equip only to a monster on your opponent's side of the field. When the equipped monster is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the equipped monster.

card.name: Shifting Shadows
card.description: Once per turn, by paying 300 Life Points, rearrange the face-down Defense Position monsters in your Main Monster Zones, then return them in face-down Defense Position.

card.name: Impenetrable Formation
card.description: Select 1 monster on your side of the field to activate this card. While you have 2 or more monsters on your side of the field, and all monsters on your side of the field are in Defense Position, the selected monster gains 700 DEF. When the selected monster is removed from the field, destroy this card.

card.name: Hero Signal
card.description: When a monster you control is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Elemental HERO" monster from your hand or Deck.

card.name: Pikeru's Second Sight
card.description: Until your opponent's second End Phase, your opponent shows you all cards that they draw before adding them to their hand.

card.name: Minefield Eruption
card.description: Inflict 1000 damage to your opponent for each face-up "Mine Golem" on your side of the field. After that, destroy all face-up "Mine Golem"(s) on your side of the field.

card.name: Kozaky's Self-Destruct Button
card.description: Inflict 1000 damage to the player who destroyed this Set card.

card.name: Mispolymerization
card.description: Activate only when a Fusion Monster is Special Summoned. Return all face-up Fusion Monsters to their respective Extra Decks.

card.name: Level Conversion Lab
card.description: Select 1 monster in your hand and show it to your opponent, then roll a six-sided die. If the result is 1, send the selected monster to the Graveyard. If the result is 2-6, the Level of the selected monster becomes equal to the result until the end of this turn.

card.name: Rock Bombardment
card.description: Send 1 Rock-Type monster from your Deck to the Graveyard; inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

card.name: Grave Lure
card.description: Turn the top card of your opponent's Deck face-up, then your opponent shuffles their Deck. When your opponent draws the face-up card, immediately send it to the Graveyard.

card.name: Token Feastevil
card.description: When a Token(s) is Special Summoned: Destroy as many Tokens on the field as possible, and if you do, inflict 300 damage to your opponent for each Token destroyed.

card.name: Spell-Stopping Statute
card.description: Activate only when your opponent activates a Continuous Spell Card. Negate the activation and the effect of the card and destroy it.

card.name: Royal Surrender
card.description: Activate only when your opponent activates a Continuous Trap Card. Negate the activation and the effect of the card and destroy it.

card.name: Lone Wolf
card.description: Activate only if the 1 and only monster on your side of the field is "Chu-Ske the Mouse Fighter", "Monk Fighter", or "Master Monk". That monster cannot be destroyed as a result of battle, and is unaffected by any of your opponent's monster effects.
